long_description: Helpful for minor backcountry injuries, the Sawyer SAM Splint uses soft aluminum alloy surrounded by foam to securely and comfortably immobilize an injured limb. Aluminum alloy core sandwiched between 2 layers of closed-cell foam provides comfortable support; splint affixes with athletic tape or wrap. Measuring 36 x 4.5 in., the Sawyer SAM Splint can be used on nearly any bone while folding up small enough to fit in most first aid kits. Splint wipes clean and is reusable.
short_description: Helpful for minor backcountry injuries, the Sawyer SAM Splint uses soft aluminum alloy surrounded by foam to securely and comfortably immobilize an injured limb.
